SQL.SQLString: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS TABLE_BAR_DATA_1DAY ( COLUMN_SYMBOLUSE TEXT NOT NULL, COLUMN_DATE TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, COLUMN_OPEN decimal(25,10) NOT NULL, COLUMN_HIGH decimal(25,10) NOT NULL, COLUMN_LOW decimal(25,10) NOT NULL, COLUMN_CLOSE decimal(25,10) NOT NULL, COLUMN_VOLUME INTEGER, COLUMN_ADJCLOSE decimal(25,10) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (COLUMN_DATE))

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS TABLE_BAR_DATA_1DAY ( COLUMN_SYMBOLUSE TEXT NOT NULL, COLUMN_DATE TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, COLUMN_OPEN decimal(25,10) NOT NULL, COLUMN_HIGH decimal(25,10) NOT NULL, COLUMN_LOW decimal(25,10) NOT NULL, COLUMN_CLOSE decimal(25,10) NOT NULL, COLUMN_VOLUME INTEGER, COLUMN_ADJCLOSE decimal(25,10) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (COLUMN_DATE))
INSERT INTO TABLE_BAR_DATA_1DAY (COLUMN_SYMBOLUSE, COLUMN_DATE, COLUMN_OPEN, COLUMN_HIGH, COLUMN_LOW, COLUMN_CLOSE, COLUMN_VOLUME, COLUMN_ADJCLOSE) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
INSERT INTO TABLE_BAR_DATA_1DAY (COLUMN_SYMBOLUSE, COLUMN_DATE, COLUMN_OPEN, COLUMN_HIGH, COLUMN_LOW, COLUMN_CLOSE, COLUMN_VOLUME, COLUMN_ADJCLOSE) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
DELETE FROM TABLE_BAR_DATA_1DAY
DELETE FROM TABLE_BAR_DATA_1DAY

SELECT COLUMN_SYMBOLUSE, COLUMN_DATE, COLUMN_OPEN, COLUMN_HIGH, COLUMN_LOW, COLUMN_CLOSE, COLUMN_VOLUME, COLUMN_ADJCLOSE FROM TABLE_BAR_DATA_1DAY WHERE COLUMN_DATE >="%1" AND COLUMN_DATE <="%2" ORDER BY COLUMN_DATE ASC

SELECT COLUMN_SYMBOLUSE, COLUMN_DATE, COLUMN_OPEN, COLUMN_HIGH, COLUMN_LOW, COLUMN_CLOSE, COLUMN_VOLUME, COLUMN_ADJCLOSE FROM TABLE_BAR_DATA_1DAY WHERE COLUMN_DATE >="%1" AND COLUMN_DATE <="%2" ORDER BY COLUMN_DATE ASC
SELECT COLUMN_DATE FROM TABLE_BAR_DATA_1DAY ORDER BY COLUMN_DATE DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT COLUMN_DATE FROM TABLE_BAR_DATA_1DAY ORDER BY COLUMN_DATE DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT COLUMN_DATE FROM TABLE_BAR_DATA_1DAY ORDER BY COLUMN_DATE ASC LIMIT 1
SELECT COLUMN_DATE FROM TABLE_BAR_DATA_1DAY ORDER BY COLUMN_DATE ASC LIMIT 1
SELECT COUNT(*) as COUNT FROM TABLE_BAR_DATA_1DAY
SELECT COUNT(*) as COUNT FROM TABLE_BAR_DATA_1DAY
SELECT MIN(COLUMN_CLOSE) AS LOW, MAX(COLUMN_CLOSE) AS HIGH FROM TABLE_BAR_DATA_1DAY
SELECT MIN(COLUMN_CLOSE) AS LOW, MAX(COLUMN_CLOSE) AS HIGH FROM TABLE_BAR_DATA_1DAY
SELECT COLUMN_CLOSE AS CURRENT FROM TABLE_BAR_DATA_1DAY ORDER BY COLUMN_DATE DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT COLUMN_CLOSE AS CURRENT FROM TABLE_BAR_DATA_1DAY ORDER BY COLUMN_DATE DESC LIMIT 1

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS TABLE_USER_INFO ( COLUMN_USEID TEXT NOT NULL, COLUMN_USERNAME TEXT NOT NULL, COLUMN_PASSWORD TEXT NOT NULL, COLUMN_LASTLOGINTIME TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, COLUMN_LOGINCOUNT INTEGER NOT NULL, COLUMN_STATE INTEGER NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (COLUMN_USEID) )

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS TABLE_USER_INFO ( COLUMN_USEID TEXT NOT NULL, COLUMN_USERNAME TEXT NOT NULL, COLUMN_PASSWORD TEXT NOT NULL, COLUMN_LASTLOGINTIME TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, COLUMN_LOGINCOUNT INTEGER NOT NULL, COLUMN_STATE INTEGER NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (COLUMN_USEID) )
INSERT INTO TABLE_USER_INFO (COLUMN_USEID, COLUMN_USERNAME, COLUMN_PASSWORD, COLUMN_LASTLOGINTIME, COLUMN_LOGINCOUNT, COLUMN_STATE) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
INSERT INTO TABLE_USER_INFO (COLUMN_USEID, COLUMN_USERNAME, COLUMN_PASSWORD, COLUMN_LASTLOGINTIME, COLUMN_LOGINCOUNT, COLUMN_STATE) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
SELECT COLUMN_USEID, COLUMN_USERNAME, COLUMN_PASSWORD, COLUMN_LASTLOGINTIME, COLUMN_LOGINCOUNT, COLUMN_STATE FROM TABLE_USER_INFO WHERE COLUMN_USERNAME = "%1" AND COLUMN_PASSWORD = "%2"
SELECT COLUMN_USEID, COLUMN_USERNAME, COLUMN_PASSWORD, COLUMN_LASTLOGINTIME, COLUMN_LOGINCOUNT, COLUMN_STATE FROM TABLE_USER_INFO WHERE COLUMN_USERNAME = "%1" AND COLUMN_PASSWORD = "%2"
UPDATE TABLE_USER_INFO SET COLUMN_LASTLOGINTIME = "%1", COLUMN_LOGINCOUNT = %2, COLUMN_STATE = %3 WHERE COLUMN_USERNAME = "%4" AND COLUMN_PASSWORD = "%5"
UPDATE TABLE_USER_INFO SET COLUMN_LASTLOGINTIME = "%1", COLUMN_LOGINCOUNT = %2, COLUMN_STATE = %3 WHERE COLUMN_USERNAME = "%4" AND COLUMN_PASSWORD = "%5"

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS TABLE_USER_TRADE_INFO ( COLUMN_USEID TEXT NOT NULL, COLUMN_TRADE_UUID TEXT NOT NULL, COLUMN_TRADE_TIME TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, COLUMN_TRADE_TYPE INTEGER NOT NULL, COLUMN_SYMBOLUSE TEXT NOT NULL, COLUMN_TRADE_PRICE decimal(25,10) NOT NULL, COLUMN_TRADE_VOLUME INTEGER NOT NULL, COLUMN_TRADE_AMOUNT decimal(25,10) NOT NULL, COLUMN_TRADE_FEES decimal(25,10) NOT NULL, COLUMN_TOTAL_TRADE_FEE decimal(25,10) NOT NULL, COLUMN_USE_ACCOUNT decimal(25,10) NOT NULL )

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS TABLE_USER_TRADE_INFO ( COLUMN_USEID TEXT NOT NULL, COLUMN_TRADE_UUID TEXT NOT NULL, COLUMN_TRADE_TIME TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, COLUMN_TRADE_TYPE INTEGER NOT NULL, COLUMN_SYMBOLUSE TEXT NOT NULL, COLUMN_TRADE_PRICE decimal(25,10) NOT NULL, COLUMN_TRADE_VOLUME INTEGER NOT NULL, COLUMN_TRADE_AMOUNT decimal(25,10) NOT NULL, COLUMN_TRADE_FEES decimal(25,10) NOT NULL, COLUMN_TOTAL_TRADE_FEE decimal(25,10) NOT NULL, COLUMN_USE_ACCOUNT decimal(25,10) NOT NULL )

INSERT INTO TABLE_USER_TRADE_INFO (COLUMN_USEID, COLUMN_TRADE_UUID, COLUMN_TRADE_TIME, COLUMN_TRADE_TYPE, COLUMN_SYMBOLUSE, COLUMN_TRADE_PRICE, COLUMN_TRADE_VOLUME, COLUMN_TRADE_AMOUNT, COLUMN_TRADE_FEES, COLUMN_TOTAL_TRADE_FEE, COLUMN_USE_ACCOUNT) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)

INSERT INTO TABLE_USER_TRADE_INFO (COLUMN_USEID, COLUMN_TRADE_UUID, COLUMN_TRADE_TIME, COLUMN_TRADE_TYPE, COLUMN_SYMBOLUSE, COLUMN_TRADE_PRICE, COLUMN_TRADE_VOLUME, COLUMN_TRADE_AMOUNT, COLUMN_TRADE_FEES, COLUMN_TOTAL_TRADE_FEE, COLUMN_USE_ACCOUNT) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
DELETE FROM TABLE_USER_TRADE_INFO
DELETE FROM TABLE_USER_TRADE_INFO

SELECT COLUMN_USEID, COLUMN_TRADE_UUID, COLUMN_TRADE_TIME, COLUMN_TRADE_TYPE, COLUMN_SYMBOLUSE, COLUMN_TRADE_PRICE, COLUMN_TRADE_VOLUME, COLUMN_TRADE_AMOUNT, COLUMN_TRADE_FEES, COLUMN_TOTAL_TRADE_FEE, COLUMN_USE_ACCOUNT FROM TABLE_USER_TRADE_INFO WHERE COLUMN_USEID="%1" AND COLUMN_SYMBOLUSE="%2" ORDER BY COLUMN_TRADE_TIME ASC

SELECT COLUMN_USEID, COLUMN_TRADE_UUID, COLUMN_TRADE_TIME, COLUMN_TRADE_TYPE, COLUMN_SYMBOLUSE, COLUMN_TRADE_PRICE, COLUMN_TRADE_VOLUME, COLUMN_TRADE_AMOUNT, COLUMN_TRADE_FEES, COLUMN_TOTAL_TRADE_FEE, COLUMN_USE_ACCOUNT FROM TABLE_USER_TRADE_INFO WHERE COLUMN_USEID="%1" AND COLUMN_SYMBOLUSE="%2" ORDER BY COLUMN_TRADE_TIME ASC

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS TABLE_USER_ACCOUNT( COLUMN_USEID TEXT NOT NULL, COLUMN_INIT_ACCOUNT decimal(25,10) NOT NULL, COLUMN_LEFT_ACCOUNT decimal(25,10) NOT NULL, COLUMN_HOLD_ACCOUNT decimal(25,10) NOT NULL, COLUMN_FLOATINT_PROFIT_LOSS decimal(25,10) NOT NULL, COLUMN_FLOATINT_PROFIT_LOSS_PERSENTAGE decimal(25,10) NOT NULL, COLUMN_UPDATE_TIME TIMESTAMP NOT NULL)

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS TABLE_USER_ACCOUNT( COLUMN_USEID TEXT NOT NULL, COLUMN_INIT_ACCOUNT decimal(25,10) NOT NULL, COLUMN_LEFT_ACCOUNT decimal(25,10) NOT NULL, COLUMN_HOLD_ACCOUNT decimal(25,10) NOT NULL, COLUMN_FLOATINT_PROFIT_LOSS decimal(25,10) NOT NULL, COLUMN_FLOATINT_PROFIT_LOSS_PERSENTAGE decimal(25,10) NOT NULL, COLUMN_UPDATE_TIME TIMESTAMP NOT NULL)
DELETE FROM TABLE_USER_ACCOUNT
DELETE FROM TABLE_USER_ACCOUNT

INSERT INTO TABLE_USER_ACCOUNT( COLUMN_USEID, COLUMN_INIT_ACCOUNT, COLUMN_LEFT_ACCOUNT, COLUMN_HOLD_ACCOUNT, COLUMN_FLOATINT_PROFIT_LOSS, COLUMN_FLOATINT_PROFIT_LOSS_PERSENTAGE, COLUMN_UPDATE_TIME) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)

INSERT INTO TABLE_USER_ACCOUNT( COLUMN_USEID, COLUMN_INIT_ACCOUNT, COLUMN_LEFT_ACCOUNT, COLUMN_HOLD_ACCOUNT, COLUMN_FLOATINT_PROFIT_LOSS, COLUMN_FLOATINT_PROFIT_LOSS_PERSENTAGE, COLUMN_UPDATE_TIME) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)

SELECT COLUMN_USEID, COLUMN_INIT_ACCOUNT, COLUMN_LEFT_ACCOUNT, COLUMN_HOLD_ACCOUNT, COLUMN_FLOATINT_PROFIT_LOSS, COLUMN_FLOATINT_PROFIT_LOSS_PERSENTAGE, COLUMN_UPDATE_TIME FROM TABLE_USER_ACCOUNT WHERE COLUMN_USEID = "%1" ORDER BY COLUMN_UPDATE_TIME ASC

SELECT COLUMN_USEID, COLUMN_INIT_ACCOUNT, COLUMN_LEFT_ACCOUNT, COLUMN_HOLD_ACCOUNT, COLUMN_FLOATINT_PROFIT_LOSS, COLUMN_FLOATINT_PROFIT_LOSS_PERSENTAGE, COLUMN_UPDATE_TIME FROM TABLE_USER_ACCOUNT WHERE COLUMN_USEID = "%1" ORDER BY COLUMN_UPDATE_TIME ASC

UPDATE TABLE_USER_ACCOUNT SET COLUMN_INIT_ACCOUNT = %1, COLUMN_LEFT_ACCOUNT = %2, COLUMN_HOLD_ACCOUNT = %3, COLUMN_FLOATINT_PROFIT_LOSS = %4, COLUMN_FLOATINT_PROFIT_LOSS_PERSENTAGE = %5, COLUMN_UPDATE_TIME = "%6" WHERE COLUMN_USEID = "%7"

UPDATE TABLE_USER_ACCOUNT SET COLUMN_INIT_ACCOUNT = %1, COLUMN_LEFT_ACCOUNT = %2, COLUMN_HOLD_ACCOUNT = %3, COLUMN_FLOATINT_PROFIT_LOSS = %4, COLUMN_FLOATINT_PROFIT_LOSS_PERSENTAGE = %5, COLUMN_UPDATE_TIME = "%6" WHERE COLUMN_USEID = "%7"

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS TABLE_USER_HOLD_ACCOUNT ( COLUMN_USERID TEXT NOT NULL, COLUMN_SYMBOLUSE TEXT NOT NULL, COLUMN_PRICE decimal(25,10) NOT NULL, COLUMN_VOLUME INTEGER NOT NULL, COLUMN_TIME TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, COLUMN_HOLDACCOUNT decimal(25,10) NOT NULL )

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS TABLE_USER_HOLD_ACCOUNT ( COLUMN_USERID TEXT NOT NULL, COLUMN_SYMBOLUSE TEXT NOT NULL, COLUMN_PRICE decimal(25,10) NOT NULL, COLUMN_VOLUME INTEGER NOT NULL, COLUMN_TIME TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, COLUMN_HOLDACCOUNT decimal(25,10) NOT NULL )
DELETE FROM TABLE_USER_HOLD_ACCOUNT
DELETE FROM TABLE_USER_HOLD_ACCOUNT
INSERT INTO TABLE_USER_HOLD_ACCOUNT (COLUMN_USERID, COLUMN_SYMBOLUSE, COLUMN_PRICE, COLUMN_VOLUME, COLUMN_TIME, COLUMN_HOLDACCOUNT) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
INSERT INTO TABLE_USER_HOLD_ACCOUNT (COLUMN_USERID, COLUMN_SYMBOLUSE, COLUMN_PRICE, COLUMN_VOLUME, COLUMN_TIME, COLUMN_HOLDACCOUNT) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
SELECT COLUMN_USERID, COLUMN_SYMBOLUSE, COLUMN_PRICE, COLUMN_VOLUME, COLUMN_TIME, COLUMN_HOLDACCOUNT FROM TABLE_USER_HOLD_ACCOUNT WHERE COLUMN_USERID = "%1" ORDER BY COLUMN_SYMBOLUSE ASC
SELECT COLUMN_USERID, COLUMN_SYMBOLUSE, COLUMN_PRICE, COLUMN_VOLUME, COLUMN_TIME, COLUMN_HOLDACCOUNT FROM TABLE_USER_HOLD_ACCOUNT WHERE COLUMN_USERID = "%1" ORDER BY COLUMN_SYMBOLUSE ASC

SELECT COLUMN_USERID, COLUMN_SYMBOLUSE, COLUMN_PRICE, COLUMN_VOLUME, COLUMN_TIME, COLUMN_HOLDACCOUNT FROM TABLE_USER_HOLD_ACCOUNT WHERE COLUMN_USERID = "%1" AND COLUMN_SYMBOLUSE = "%2" ORDER BY COLUMN_SYMBOLUSE ASC

SELECT COLUMN_USERID, COLUMN_SYMBOLUSE, COLUMN_PRICE, COLUMN_VOLUME, COLUMN_TIME, COLUMN_HOLDACCOUNT FROM TABLE_USER_HOLD_ACCOUNT WHERE COLUMN_USERID = "%1" AND COLUMN_SYMBOLUSE = "%2" ORDER BY COLUMN_SYMBOLUSE ASC
UPDATE TABLE_USER_HOLD_ACCOUNT SET COLUMN_PRICE = %1, COLUMN_VOLUME = %2, COLUMN_TIME = "%3", COLUMN_HOLDACCOUNT = %4 WHERE COLUMN_USERID = "%5" AND COLUMN_SYMBOLUSE = "%6"
UPDATE TABLE_USER_HOLD_ACCOUNT SET COLUMN_PRICE = %1, COLUMN_VOLUME = %2, COLUMN_TIME = "%3", COLUMN_HOLDACCOUNT = %4 WHERE COLUMN_USERID = "%5" AND COLUMN_SYMBOLUSE = "%6"

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS TABLE_MINTIME_MAXTIME ( COLUMN_SYMBOLUSE TEXT NOT NULL, COLUMN_MINTIME TIMESTAMP, COLUMN_MAXTIME TIMESTAMP, COLUMN_COUNT INTEGER, COLUMN_LOW decimal(25,10) NOT NULL, COLUMN_HIGH decimal(25,10) NOT NULL, COLUMN_CURRENT decimal(25,10) NOT NULL, COLUMN_CURRENTPERCENTAGE decimal(25,10) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (COLUMN_SYMBOLUSE) )

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS TABLE_MINTIME_MAXTIME ( COLUMN_SYMBOLUSE TEXT NOT NULL, COLUMN_MINTIME TIMESTAMP, COLUMN_MAXTIME TIMESTAMP, COLUMN_COUNT INTEGER, COLUMN_LOW decimal(25,10) NOT NULL, COLUMN_HIGH decimal(25,10) NOT NULL, COLUMN_CURRENT decimal(25,10) NOT NULL, COLUMN_CURRENTPERCENTAGE decimal(25,10) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (COLUMN_SYMBOLUSE) )
INSERT INTO TABLE_MINTIME_MAXTIME (COLUMN_SYMBOLUSE, COLUMN_MINTIME, COLUMN_MAXTIME, COLUMN_COUNT, COLUMN_LOW, COLUMN_HIGH, COLUMN_CURRENT, COLUMN_CURRENTPERCENTAGE) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
INSERT INTO TABLE_MINTIME_MAXTIME (COLUMN_SYMBOLUSE, COLUMN_MINTIME, COLUMN_MAXTIME, COLUMN_COUNT, COLUMN_LOW, COLUMN_HIGH, COLUMN_CURRENT, COLUMN_CURRENTPERCENTAGE) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
DELETE FROM TABLE_MINTIME_MAXTIME
DELETE FROM TABLE_MINTIME_MAXTIME

UPDATE TABLE_MINTIME_MAXTIME SET COLUMN_SYMBOLUSE = "%1", COLUMN_MINTIME = "%2", COLUMN_MAXTIME = "%3", COLUMN_COUNT = %4, COLUMN_LOW = "%5", COLUMN_HIGH = "%6", COLUMN_CURRENT = "%7", COLUMN_CURRENTPERCENTAGE = "%8" WHERE COLUMN_SYMBOLUSE = "%9"

UPDATE TABLE_MINTIME_MAXTIME SET COLUMN_SYMBOLUSE = "%1", COLUMN_MINTIME = "%2", COLUMN_MAXTIME = "%3", COLUMN_COUNT = %4, COLUMN_LOW = "%5", COLUMN_HIGH = "%6", COLUMN_CURRENT = "%7", COLUMN_CURRENTPERCENTAGE = "%8" WHERE COLUMN_SYMBOLUSE = "%9"
SELECT COLUMN_SYMBOLUSE, COLUMN_MINTIME, COLUMN_MAXTIME, COLUMN_COUNT, COLUMN_LOW, COLUMN_HIGH, COLUMN_CURRENT, COLUMN_CURRENTPERCENTAGE FROM TABLE_MINTIME_MAXTIME WHERE COLUMN_SYMBOLUSE = "%1"
SELECT COLUMN_SYMBOLUSE, COLUMN_MINTIME, COLUMN_MAXTIME, COLUMN_COUNT, COLUMN_LOW, COLUMN_HIGH, COLUMN_CURRENT, COLUMN_CURRENTPERCENTAGE FROM TABLE_MINTIME_MAXTIME WHERE COLUMN_SYMBOLUSE = "%1"
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS TABLE_SYMBOLUSE_MANAGER ( COLUMN_SYMBOLUSE TEXT NOT NULL, COLUMN_MAXTIME TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, COLUMN_UPDATFAILED INTEGER, PRIMARY KEY (COLUMN_SYMBOLUSE))
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS TABLE_SYMBOLUSE_MANAGER ( COLUMN_SYMBOLUSE TEXT NOT NULL, COLUMN_MAXTIME TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, COLUMN_UPDATFAILED INTEGER, PRIMARY KEY (COLUMN_SYMBOLUSE))
SELECT COLUMN_SYMBOLUSE, COLUMN_MAXTIME, COLUMN_UPDATFAILED FROM TABLE_SYMBOLUSE_MANAGER WHERE COLUMN_SYMBOLUSE = "%1"
SELECT COLUMN_SYMBOLUSE, COLUMN_MAXTIME, COLUMN_UPDATFAILED FROM TABLE_SYMBOLUSE_MANAGER WHERE COLUMN_SYMBOLUSE = "%1"
INSERT INTO TABLE_SYMBOLUSE_MANAGER (COLUMN_SYMBOLUSE, COLUMN_MAXTIME, COLUMN_UPDATFAILED) VALUES (?, ?, ?)
INSERT INTO TABLE_SYMBOLUSE_MANAGER (COLUMN_SYMBOLUSE, COLUMN_MAXTIME, COLUMN_UPDATFAILED) VALUES (?, ?, ?)
UPDATE TABLE_SYMBOLUSE_MANAGER SET COLUMN_MAXTIME = "%1", COLUMN_UPDATFAILED = %2 WHERE COLUMN_SYMBOLUSE = "%3"
UPDATE TABLE_SYMBOLUSE_MANAGER SET COLUMN_MAXTIME = "%1", COLUMN_UPDATFAILED = %2 WHERE COLUMN_SYMBOLUSE = "%3"
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS TABLE_STOCKSSQLITE ( COLUMN_SYMBOLUSE TEXT, COLUMN_NAMEPINYINFIRST TEXT, COLUMN_NAMEPINYINFULL0 TEXT, COLUMN_NAMEPINYINFULL4 TEXT, COLUMN_NAMEUTF8 nvarchar(256))
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS TABLE_STOCKSSQLITE ( COLUMN_SYMBOLUSE TEXT, COLUMN_NAMEPINYINFIRST TEXT, COLUMN_NAMEPINYINFULL0 TEXT, COLUMN_NAMEPINYINFULL4 TEXT, COLUMN_NAMEUTF8 nvarchar(256))
INSERT INTO TABLE_STOCKSSQLITE (COLUMN_SYMBOLUSE, COLUMN_NAMEPINYINFIRST, COLUMN_NAMEPINYINFULL0, COLUMN_NAMEPINYINFULL4, COLUMN_NAMEUTF8) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
INSERT INTO TABLE_STOCKSSQLITE (COLUMN_SYMBOLUSE, COLUMN_NAMEPINYINFIRST, COLUMN_NAMEPINYINFULL0, COLUMN_NAMEPINYINFULL4, COLUMN_NAMEUTF8) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
SELECT COLUMN_SYMBOLUSE, COLUMN_NAMEPINYINFIRST, COLUMN_NAMEPINYINFULL0, COLUMN_NAMEPINYINFULL4, COLUMN_NAMEUTF8 FROM TABLE_STOCKSSQLITE ORDER BY COLUMN_SYMBOLUSE ASC
SELECT COLUMN_SYMBOLUSE, COLUMN_NAMEPINYINFIRST, COLUMN_NAMEPINYINFULL0, COLUMN_NAMEPINYINFULL4, COLUMN_NAMEUTF8 FROM TABLE_STOCKSSQLITE ORDER BY COLUMN_SYMBOLUSE ASC
